description: This file defines an 'AssessmentsService' class, providing placeholder asynchronous methods for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting assessment records. The class interacts with assessment data schemas and acts as a stub for future repository or database integration, serving as the core service layer for assessments within the application.

classes.name: AssessmentsService
classes.description: A placeholder service class managing assessments with asynchronous methods for CRUD operations.

methods.name: list_assessments
methods.description: Returns a placeholder list of assessments encapsulated in an AssessmentListResponse object.

methods.name: get_assessment
methods.description: Returns a placeholder assessment record by ID.

methods.name: create_assessment
methods.description: Creates an assessment from a payload and returns the created assessment.

methods.name: update_assessment
methods.description: Updates an assessment record with provided data and returns the updated record.

methods.name: delete_assessment
methods.description: Deletes an assessment record by ID and returns a confirmation dictionary.
